definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: Your major and minor don't matter.
sentences.chinese: 你的主修科目和辅修科目不重要。

sentences.english: I majored in classical voice and art and minored in dance and drama.
sentences.chinese: 我主修古典声乐和艺术，辅修舞蹈和舞剧。

sentences.english: And yeah, so that's what I'm minoring in,  like gardening and farming stuff like that.
sentences.chinese: 那就是我正在辅修的课程，园艺和农业类的课程。

sentences.english: I I majored in English and minored in French back in my college.
sentences.chinese: 我大学时候的专业是英语，辅修法语。

sentences.english: In college I took a side subject called 2-D animation.
sentences.chinese: 在学院里，我辅修了一门叫做二维动画的课。

sentences.english: His minor subjects included philosophy and military science.
I took a side subject called 2-D animation.
sentences.chinese: 在学院里，我辅修了一门叫做二维动画的课。

sentences.english: I minored in literature in addition to art.
sentences.chinese: 我除了辅修艺术以外还辅修文学。

sentences.english: I minored in literature in addition to art.
sentences.chinese: 我除了辅修艺术以外还辅修文学。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about your minor?
sentences.chinese: 能告诉我们你的辅修课目吗？

sentences.english: My major's in directing. My minor's best boy.
sentences.chinese: 我主修导演，辅修场务助理。

sentences.english: Some courses from neural science, psychology, sociology, and education can be applied to the minor as well.
sentences.chinese: 还可以申请辅修神经科学，心理学，社会学和教育学。

sentences.english: Total 40 Credits, Including Core Courses: 71 Credits.
sentences.chinese: 辅修本专业必须完成40学分，其中必修71学分。

sentences.english: I'm minoring in Spanish right now.
sentences.chinese: 现在我也在辅修西班牙语。

sentences.english: What are your major subject and minor subjects?
sentences.chinese: 你的主修科目和辅修科目是什么？

definition: (at a school) to take as an elective/an elective/elective (subject)
to major (in a field)/to study a specialty to obtain a higher degree
general course/general education course/core course/general curriculum/general education curriculum/core curriculum
to switch from one major or faculty to another (at a university)
